mapper.select: /*택배 거래처 리스트*/ select couacc_name, couacc_area, char_manager, char_tel, couacc_cnt, couacc_cost, to_char(startdate,'yy-mm-dd') startdate, to_char(enddate,'yy-mm-dd') enddate, to_char(couacc_date,'yy-mm-dd') couacc_date, NVL2(couacc_update, to_char(couacc_update,'yy-mm-dd'), '-') couacc_update, com_no, couacc_tel, couacc_fax, couacc_email from courier order by couacc_date desc, startdate desc, enddate

/*잡지 거래처 리스트*/ select com_name, char_manager, char_tel, char_email, to_char(startdate,'yy-mm-dd') startdate, to_char(enddate,'yy-mm-dd') enddate, to_char(mcom_date,'yy-mm-dd') mcom_date, NVL2(mcom_update, to_char(mcom_update,'yy-mm-dd'), '-') mcom_update, com_no, mcom_name, mcom_tel, mcom_add, char_fax, acc_manager, acc_tel, acc_email, acc_fax, bacc_bank, bacc_name, bacc_accno, rzip_code, raddress from magazine_company order by mcom_date desc, startdate desc, enddate
mapper.insert: /*잡지 거래처 등록*/ insert into magazine_company(com_no, mcom_name, mcom_tel, char_tel, char_manager, char_email, char_fax, acc_manager, acc_email, acc_fax, mcom_add, acc_tel, startdate, enddate, raddress, rzip_code, bacc_bank, bacc_accno, com_name, bacc_name) values(#{com_no},#{mcom_name},#{mcom_tel},#{char_tel},#{char_manager}, #{char_email}, #{char_fax}, #{acc_manager}, #{acc_email}, #{acc_fax}, #{mcom_add}, #{acc_tel}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{raddress}, #{rzip_code}, #{bacc_bank}, #{bacc_accno}, #{com_name}, #{bacc_name})

/*택배 거래처 등록*/ insert into courier(com_no, couacc_area, couacc_name, couacc_tel, couacc_cnt, startdate, enddate, couacc_fax, couacc_email, char_manager, char_tel, couacc_cost) values(#{com_no}, #{couacc_area}, #{couacc_name}, #{couacc_tel}, #{couacc_cnt}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{couacc_fax}, #{couacc_email}, #{char_manager}, #{char_tel}, #{couacc_cost})
